post:
Hello everyone,

We have a few servers ready to go for anyone who wishes to have a server in the mighty viking lands of Norway!

Who are we? 

Terrahost is a hosting provider founded in 2006 located in Sandefjord, Norway. We own and operate our own datacenters. The newest datacenter DC2 set to complete within Q1/Q2 2018. We have Telenor and Altibox transits and operate our own BGP backed network.

LG: http://lg.terrahost.no/  
AS Info: https://bgp.he.net/AS203629  
BGP: Sessions/announcements on dedicated servers are free.  

**Servers from 30 EUR, please see the following link:  
https://terrahost.no/dedikert-server/marked**

Every server is delivered with:  
1IPv4  
/48 IPv6  
5TB Traffic  
1 Gbps Port  
Hardware RAID (Will be setup as requested, e.g. R1, R10)

VAT is removed once logged in for any non Norwegian customers.

**Please note that there are only one of each server available, first come first serve.** If you get "Product not found", your server has just been ordered by someone else!
